law.catch_line: Adoption and enforcement of ordinances to implement plan.
law.text: Local governments may adopt and enforce ordinances necessary to implement the noise control plan and any other program adopted pursuant to KRS 224.30-175. Such ordinances shall not be stricter than the standards promulgated by the state and federal governments.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 14, effective June 21, 1974.
